text: Title: 💡 Energy Prices Soaring: A Wake-Up Call for National Self-Sufficiency 🇺🇸🇬🇧🇩🇪Body:Ladies and gentlemen, it's time to face the harsh reality of our energy-dependent world. The ongoing Ukraine War has sent shockwaves through the global energy market, causing oil and gas prices to skyrocket. This is a clear reminder of the vulnerabilities that come with relying on foreign sources for our energy needs.As we watch the price of gasoline and natural gas climb higher and higher, it's essential that we, as responsible citizens, start considering the long-term implications of this situation. The mainstream media may try to downplay the severity of the issue, but the facts speak for themselves.The Ukraine War is just the latest in a long line of geopolitical conflicts that have disrupted energy supplies and driven up prices. From the Middle East to the Arctic, the world's energy resources are increasingly becoming the focus of international tensions.It's time for us to take matters into our own hands and stri
